document.full_text: after getting rebuffed earlier, conagra foods on wednesday announced an all-cash offer of $86 a share for ralcorp, in a push to expand its presence in generic products.
document.title: conagra bids $4.9 billion for ralcorp
lines_and_colors: after getting rebuffed earlier, conagra foods on wednesday announced an all-cash offer of $86 a share for ralcorp, in a push to expand its presence in generic products.
